scripts.say: Commander, all fleets are progressing smoothly, and are now advancing as planned to the central area.
We're encountering fewer and fewer Siren forces as we push towards the center.
Perhaps they destroyed all of their forces in the sneak attack...
Whatever the reason might be, though, I'll gladly take it.
Commander, I'm a bit interested in that additional objective. That is, to investigate the identity of the "mysterious individual."
That's also why North Carolina and Washington are with us. They appear to have seen this mysterious ship during their last excursion into the Mirror Seas.
When that ship attacked NY City, it was said that the silhouette of her riggings resembled my own...
Commander has also seen that ship. For all three of us to be assembled in this fleet, it can be said that our true purpose is to meet her face-to-face.
Sorry that I didn't tell you earlier, Washington.
It's cool. Doesn't really bother me.
Whoever the hell they are, they've fought back some of the elite Sirens. However, they clearly aren't on our side either.
If what Saratoga and Commander said about her being allied with the Sirens during their attack on NY City is true, then we'll have to steel ourselves for a confrontation.
That's right... We should be approaching our target very soon.
I don't like the feeling of this... My skin's beginning to crawl...
The other fleets should be joining up with us shortly. Everyone, let's push forward carefully!
